name: Sinner Paris
description: Sinner is the first hotel in the Evok Hotels Collection to lay claim to a lifestyle of relaxed luxury, bringing boldness and the ultimate sophistication straight to the gates of Le Marais. Sinner is a location laden with many pasts. An area of multiple expressions among heritage, design and architecture. Inside, the designer Tristan Auer emphasizes the volumes with his atypical, highly visual combinations.Paris is free here.iHotelier/iStay

name: Nolinski Paris
description: Nolinski Paris is set in the 1st arr. District in Paris, 500 metres from Tuileries Garden and within easy reach from the Rue du Faubourg Saint-Honoré shopping area. This Parisian 5-star hotel features a spa with a pool, a sauna, a hammam and massage rooms. In the spa, guests can enjoy La Colline beauty products. The bright and spacious rooms and suites of Nolinski Paris are fitted with fine bedding, spacious wardrobes, plush carpets and rich curtains, and feature an elegant desk. Bathrobes and slippers are available for your comfort. Some rooms offer windows and balconies opening out onto the heart of Paris. Nolinski Le Restaurant offers guests the opportunity to enjoy dishes created by the hotel's executive chef, Philip Chronopoulos, whilst surrounded by decor by British designer John Whelan, who has combined Art Deco style with 1970s touches. The Grand Salon invites guests to relax with soothing teas, to sample Mediterranean dishes for lunch and dinner, or enjoy late-night cocktails. Nearby the property guests can enjoy a lunch or dinner at the Two-Michelin-Starred Palais Royal gourmet restaurant. Nolinski Paris reception staff are available 24/7. Louvre Museum and Opéra Garnier can be reached within 1 km of the hotel. The nearest airport is Paris Orly Airport, at 15 km from Nolinski Paris.

name: Maison Breguet
description: Maison Bréguet is a hotel with a restaurant and a bar in Paris, 500 metres from Place de la Bastille. Guests can enjoy massages and use the fitness centre in this 5-star hotel. All rooms have air-conditioning and soundproofing. The private bathrooms have either a bath or a shower and include free toiletries and slippers. Each room has a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. A continental breakfast is served every morning at the property and the restaurant specialises in French cuisine. Other facilities at Maison Bréguet include a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and a garden. A laundry service is available for a fee and there is also a business centre. Opéra Bastille is 650 metres from Maison Bréguet, while Place de la République is a 17-minute walk from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 18 km away.

name: Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa
description: Boasting a restaurant, bar and views of city, Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa is set in Paris, less than 1 km from Gare Saint-Lazare. With a terrace, the 5-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation offers room service, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests. At the hotel, the rooms come with a desk. Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa features some units that feature a balcony, and the rooms are equipped with a coffee machine. All guest rooms in the accommodation are fitted with a TV with satellite channels and an iPad. Guests at Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa can enjoy a continental breakfast. Speaking English, Spanish, French and Portuguese, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Opéra Garnier, Pigalle Metro Station and La Cigale Concert Hall. The nearest airport is Paris - Charles de Gaulle Airport, 24 km from Paris j'Adore Hotel & Spa.

name: Hôtel & Spa Royal Madeleine
description: Boasting a fitness centre and a spa & wellness centre, Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa is situated in Paris. It is 600 metres from Édouard VII Theatre, 500 metres from Olympia and Opéra Garnier and a 14-minute walk from Tuileries Garden. The property is located in the 8th arr. District, 1.4 km from Orsay Museum. The rooms in the hotel are equipped with air conditioning, a desk and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. With a private bathroom, they also feature free WiFi. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the property. There is an in-house restaurant, which serves European cuisine. When guests need guidance on where to visit, the reception will be happy to provide advice. Galeries Lafayette and Printemps Department Stores are 400 metres away. La Cigale Concert Hall is a 19-minute walk from Royal Madeleine Hotel & Spa, while Louvre Museum is a 20-minute walk away. The nearest airport is Paris - Orly, 16 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Parister & Spa
description: Located in Paris, a 2-minute walk from Cadet Metro Station and the Folies Bergère Theatre, and 1.2 km from Opera Garnier, Hotel Parister & Spa features restaurant and a bar, as well as a spa center with a swimming-pool, hammam and a fitness centre available for free. The air-conditioned rooms features a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a Nespresso coffee machine and a minibar. They all have a Marshall speaker and a private bathroom with free Nuxe toiletries, bathrobes and slippers, while some features a spa bath. Hotel Parister & Spa features free WiFi throughout the property. Breakfast are available each morning from 7am to 10am and until 10.30am on Sunday. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Sacré-Coeur is 1.3 km from Hotel Parister & Spa. Paris - Orly Airport is 16 km away.

name: Majestic Hotel - Spa Champs Elysées
description: This 5-star hotel is located in Paris’s 16th district just 400 metres from Place de l'Étoile and the Arc de Triomphe. It offers air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant and guests have free access to the spa facilities. Rooms at Majestic Hotel Spa combine old Parisian style and more contemporary pieces of art. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, iPod docking stations and a private bathroom. Some rooms and suites have a private terrace or kitchenette. Wi-Fi access is available in all the rooms and the hotel also has facilities for disabled guests. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées wellness spa has a swimming pool, hammam and fitness room. Majestic Hotel Spa - Champs Elysées is 190 metres from Kléber Metro Station (line 6) and 400 metres from Charles de Gaulle – Étoile Metro (lines 1, 2 and 6). The Eiffel Tower is a 15-minute walk from the hotel and the Champs Elysées is 5 minutes away.

name: La Villa Haussmann
description: Located in Paris, 1.1 km from Opéra Garnier, La Villa Haussmann boasts an indoor swimming pool and fitness centre. Free WiFi is featured throughout the property and guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. The rooms at La Villa Haussmann are equipped with a flat-screen TV and some of the rooms feature a seating area for your convenience. All rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and extras include bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Breakfast is served daily and guests can have a drink at the hotel's bar. Arc de Triomphe is 1.6 km from La Villa Haussmann, while Tuileries Garden is 1.6 km from the property. Paris - Orly Airport is 17 km away.
